title: Paraboot
description: E-commerce website for the French shoemaker established in 1908.
content: E-commerce website for the French shoemaker established in 1908. Using Directus, Wordpress and custom React TypeScript Gutenberg blocks.

title: Plan Cult'
description: Website made during my studies in Université de Savoie
content: React Native app made during my studies. The app aims to vulgarize history by reusing the mechanics of dating apps and pokémon GO.

title: mooxy
description: Website for the company I've worked in for 2 years, a communication agency based in Annecy, France. The goal in this website is to have a page weight that is as low as possible to have a good eco-index. The site is static.
content: Website for the company I've worked in for 2 years, a communication agency based in Annecy, France. The goal in this website is to have a page weight that is as low as possible to have a good eco-index. The site is static though the content can be administrated through Wordpress.

title: App 21st edition Étoiles du sport
description: Progressive web app made for the 21st edition of the "Étoiles du sport" program based in Tignes for 1 week.
content: Progressive web app made for the 21st edition of the "Étoiles du sport" program based in Tignes for 1 week. All of the content can be administrated in Wordpress by the staff of the event. The web-app can be used as a regular app (almost) which makes it comfortable for the participants to be informed about their planning during the event.

title: Poésie urbaine
description: In collaboration with Annecy paysages / Bonlieu scène nationale d'Annecy, this project is a 5 minutes experience in augmented reality that can play by scanned a QR code in the city center of Annecy near the "Vieux château".
